system.effect: Fancy Ceilings for a morale boost. +5 Morale, but -X Space (Raiders, -1), (Frigates/Transports, -2), (Light Cruisers, -3), (Cruisers, -4). Poor: additional -1 space, Good: +7 Morale instead of +5, Best: +10 Morale instead of +5. Only Once per Vessel

description.value: Fancy Ceilings for a morale boost. +5 Morale, but -X Space (Raiders, -1), (Frigates/Transports, -2), (Light Cruisers, -3), (Cruisers, -4). Poor: additional -1 space, Good: +7 Morale instead of +5, Best: +10 Morale instead of +5. Only Once per Vessel
